column4: hi, i'm looking for a CD encoder which will output tagged FLAC files along with CUE or TOC files. doesnt nescassarily need to be graphical. any suggestions?
sound-juicer does tags but no TOC, cdrdao does toc but no tags, cdparanoia does neither...
rythmbox should do that for you, comes with ubuntu
does it do TOCs? erUSUL, i thought about that, but then i need to manually enter all the tags dont i?
